title: Your Contribution, Their Success Story
description: The Hall, built with generous alumni contributions, stands as a testament to the enduring bond between past and present, fostering collaboration and innovation for future generations.

title: Alumni Mentorship Program Launched
description: Our new mentorship initiative pairs graduates with current students, providing guidance, career advice, & industry insights to the next generation of engineers.
